devdoc.details: This contract deploys new instances of DTrust and tracks them

params.dtrustAddress: The payable address of the DTRUST contract from which to collect the fee

params._bankWallet: The address of the bank wallet where fees are collected

params._beneficiaries: Array of addresses designated as beneficiaries
params._canRevokeAddresses: Array of addresses with permission to revoke the dtrust
params._settlor: Address of the settlor creating the dtrust
params._trustees: Array of addresses designated as trustees

returns._0: The count of all DTRUST contracts
An array of addresses of DTRUST contracts linked to the user

devdoc.title: DTRUSTFactory

DTrustCreated(address,address).notice: Event emitted when a new DTrust contract is created

UserAddedToDTrust(address,address).notice: Event emitted when a user is added to a DTrust contract

allDTrusts(uint256).notice: Dynamic array of all deployed DTrust contracts

bankFee().notice: Fee percentage for the bank; scaled by 100 (e.g., 10 represents 0.10%, 100 represents 1%, 1000 represents 10%)

bankWallet().notice: Public variable with the address of the bank wallet

collectAnnualFeeForTrust(address).notice: Collects the annual fee for a specified DTRUST contract

constructor.notice: Constructs the DTRUSTFactory and sets the bank wallet address

createDTRUST(string,address,address[],ad.notice: Creates a new DTRUST contract and registers the involved parties

dTrustsByUser(address,uint256).notice: Mapping from user addresses to their respective DTrust contracts

getAllDTrustsCount().notice: Returns the total number of DTRUST contracts created by the factory

getDTrustsByUser(address).notice: Retrieves the DTRUST contracts associated with a given user

isUserAddedToDTrust(address,address).notice: Mapping to check if a user has been added to a DTrust contract to prevent duplicates

userdoc.notice: Factory contract for creating new DTrust contracts
